*CALIPIO* 
 This tool allows you to capture your screen combining Scree + Webcam + Mic. You do not need to install anything, it works right from your browser. Keep your recordings organized and share them with your team or with external people. 

 `Find Calipio on your Basaas >> Content Creation.` 

 *For those of you interested, please leave your username on the thread.*

*Interview in Digital News Asia* 
 DNA has released an <https://www.digitalnewsasia.com/digital-economy/problem-digital-rights-we-are-still-30-years-past|interview about Jean>. 

 Check it out!

The UN World Data Forum 2021, hosted by the Federal Statistical Office of Switzerland, will take place from 3 to 6 October 2021 in Bern, Switzerland in a hybrid format. See full programme <https://whova.com/embedded/event/unwdf_202110/?utc_source=ems |here>.

:fire: *BASAAS* is changing the way they deliver their service: for a number of reasons they are dropping the desktop version and concentrating on a <https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/basaas-extension/dfnefpadkibojlglpobnjbphlaojobfg?hl=en | browser extension>. 
 The experience is quite similar and we are working with them to make it as productive as possible. 
 We urge you to start installing the extension before they desktop app is deprecated. We may be running a training session on this. Please don't hesitate to reach out with questions.

:mailbox_with_mail: We have started to deploy email filters in our unified public email (<mailto://Contact@TheIOFoundation | Contact@TheIOFoundation>). You may have observed some *Email Notification* messages in certain channels. These are emails that are forwarded from Contact@ that should be of interest of the members of those channels. 
 You will find things such as events or updates of products we use across the organization.

elements.text: :pushpin: Do you have something to include in the newsletter? *Contact us so we can work on it*.
